pages.title: Adding Modifiers
pages.text: Every modular explosive consists an Archetype specifying what it does (damaging entities, destroying blocks, both, or just pure visuals) and can then accept a list of modifiers for further customisation. A Modifier can be the lighting of fire, changing the explosions damage type, increasing the blast radius, damage and much more.
